name: Martial Arts Brutality
description: In this turn based tactical card fighter, you will learn the secrets of Kung Fu, master control of your formidable Chi Energy and perfect the legendary Dim Mak death touch.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win XP/Vista/7 or higher Processor: 2.0GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB of video memory Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound
